changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'option \"Appli: Correction of a bug on the "Apply on" option when the commands are invisible
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les images: Correction of a bug on the images
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis d'envoi de widget: Fixed a problem with sending a widget to the market

index.md.Le plugin widget est un plugin un peu pa: The widget plugin is a bit special because it does not allow you to create equipment but to modify the rendering (display) of an order
index.md.L'objectif de ce plugin est donc de perm: The objective of this plugin is therefore to simply customize the way to display a value, info, or action according to his tastes and desires
index.md.112 de Jeedom, il est possible de person: 112 of Jeedom, it is possible to customize widgets with specific options (created by the widget developer)
index.md.On peut donc avoir un widget qui s'affic: So we can have a widget that will display differently from one order to another
index.md.Ainsi, on peut avoir un même widget écri: So, we can have the same widget written in blue on one order and in green on another
index.md.Widget et Tuile, à ne pas confondre: Widget and Tile, not to be confused
index.md.Le widget, c'est la partie qui va se cha: The widget is the part that will take care of formatting and displaying an info or order
index.md.Un widget ne doit s'occuper que d'une se: A widget should only handle one command or info
index.md.La Tuile, c'est un regroupement de widge: La Tuile is a grouping of widgets for a module
index.md.C'est la zone dans laquelle vont s'affic: This is the area in which the different widgets applied to the commands and info of the module will be displayed
index.md.Comme pour tout plugin, le plugin Widget: As with any plugin, the Widget plugin is installed from the Jeedom interface, "General" menu ⇒ "Plugins
index.md.Cliquer sur l'icône verte pour accéder d: Click on the green icon to go directly to the Market
index.md.Dans cette fenêtre cliquer sur \"Officie: In this window click on "Official" and in the search field put "Widget
index.md.Cela ouvre la fiche du plugin dans laque: This opens the plugin file where several information is found
index.md.Une fois installé, Jeedom vous demande s: Once installed, Jeedom asks you if you want to go to the plugin configuration page
index.md.Sur la page de configuration du plugin w: On the widget plugin configuration page, we only have one option for this plugin
index.md.Par défaut le plugin est désactivé: By default the plugin is disabled
index.md.je vous invite donc à cliquer sur le bou: I invite you to click on the green button "activate
index.md.Dès à présent le plugin est actif et opé: As of now the plugin is active and operational
index.md.Présentation et fonction de base du Plug: Presentation and basic function of the Widget Plugin
index.md.Afin de se rendre dans le plugin Widget,: To go to the Widget plugin, go to the "Plugins" menu ⇒ "Programming" ⇒ "Widget
index.md.On se trouve donc sur la page principale: So we are on the main plugin page
index.md.Ce dernier dispose par défaut d'un évent: By default, the latter has a range of widgets as soon as it is installed. You can download others via the market or create your own widgets (see below)
index.md.En cliquant sur l'un des widgets de la l: By clicking on one of the widgets in the list on the right or left menu you will open the widget configuration page, in which you can modify, see a preview of the widget (if Jeedom finds a compatible command) and a whole lots of configuration info like widget source code
index.md.Si vous modifiez un widget qui n'est pas: If you modify a widget that is not one of your creations, it is preferable to duplicate it to avoid losing your modifications if the original widget is updated
index.md.Pour plus d'infos sur la configuration e: For more info on configuration and widget creation see below
index.md.Appliquer le widget sur une commande: Apply the widget on an order
index.md.Pour appliquer un widget sur une seule c: To apply a widget to a single command or modify the one applied, you must go to the module configuration page
index.md.Le chemin pour accéder au module diverge: The path to access the module differs according to the type of the latter
index.md.Pour les modules Z-Wave, \"Plugins\"⇒\"P: For Z-Wave modules, "Plugins" ⇒ "Home automation protocol" ⇒ "Z-wave", then choose the module of the command you want to modify
index.md.Sur la page de configuration du module,: On the module configuration page, go to the command and click on the toothed wheels
index.md.Dans la nouvelle fenêtre, se rendre dans: In the new window, go to the "Advanced view" tab
index.md.Vous pouvez ici modifier le widget appli: Here you can modify the widget applied for computers and mobiles with the dedicated drop-down lists
index.md.Elles ne fournissent que les widgets com: They only provide widgets compatible with the type of command
index.md.Appliquer le widget sur plusieurs comman: Apply the widget on several commands
index.md.En cliquant sur le bouton \"Appliquer su: By clicking on the button "Apply to orders" you open a window which lists all the commands compatible with the type of widget
index.md.Vous pouvez donc simplement appliquer ou: So you can simply apply or remove the widget to many orders at once
index.md.Il suffit de cocher les commandes sur le: Just check the commands on which you want to apply the widget
index.md.Divers exemples pour une même commande: Various examples for the same order
index.md.112 de Jeedom, il est possible de person: 112 of Jeedom, it is possible to customize widgets with specific options (created by the widget developer) and common to all widgets
index.md.On peut accéder à ces options de 2 façon: There are 2 ways to access these options
index.md.Soit par l'arbre Domotique qui se trouve: Or by the Home Automation tree which is in the "General" menu ⇒ "Home Automation Summary
index.md.Sur cette page vous trouvez tous vos élé: On this page you find all your home automation elements, objects, modules, commands
index.md.Cliquez sur la petite roue crantée pour: Click on the small notched wheel to access the configuration page
index.md.Soit depuis la page de configuration des: Either from the module configuration page
index.md.Dans l'onglet \"Affichage avancé\" on tr: In the "Advanced display" tab, there are 2 drop-down lists which allow you to change the widget used on a computer for the order and the other for mobile devices
index.md.Il y a aussi d'autres options, pour affi: There are also other options, to display or not the names and stats, force the line break before / after the widget if there are several commands in a module (line breaks in the tile)
index.md.Enfin la liste des paramètres optionnels: Finally the list of optional Widget parameters applied
index.md.Pour ajouter une option il vous suffit d: To add an option, simply click on the "Add" button, enter the name of the option with the correct lower and upper case letters, as well as the value to be assigned to the option
index.md.Voir la doc sur le Résumé domotique ⇒: See the doc on the Home automation summary ⇒
index.md.Le plugin offre 2 possibilités pour la c: The plugin offers 2 possibilities for the creation of Widgets, the easy mode which allows to make basic widgets easily with a creation assistant, and the advanced mode which also allows the modification thereafter of all widgets
index.md.Toutefois, il vous faut avoir quelques c: However, you need to have some knowledge of basic programming language such as HTML and CSS for the base and JavaScript to be able to do things a little more complex
index.md.Pour réaliser un widget avec l'assistant: To make a widget with the wizard, you just need to go to the plugin
index.md.A partir de cette page, cliquer sur le b: From this page, click on the "Easy creation mode" button at the top left
index.md.Sur la nouvelle page, vous pouvez dans l: On the new page, you can in the right part, view the basic Jeedom icons, the images you have imported and the imported packages
index.md.Sur la partie de gauche, en premier un b: On the left side, first a button to import packs or images, then 3 buttons to create a widget
index.md.Widget On\/Off ⇒ Destiné aux commandes b: On / Off Widget ⇒ Intended for button commands for on / off
index.md.Widget Simple Etat ⇒ Destiné aux command: Simple State Widget ⇒ Intended for commands which have a status feedback
index.md.Widget Numérique ⇒ Destiné aux commandes: Numeric Widget ⇒ Intended for commands that send a numeric value (example
index.md.Exemple avec la création d'un widget d'é: Example with the creation of a status widget
index.md.Cet exemple reste applicable pour les 2: This example remains applicable for the 2 other types of creation
index.md.Cliquer sur le bouton \"Widget Simple Et: Click on the button "Simple State Widget
index.md.On arrive sur la page de configuration a: We arrive on the assisted configuration page
index.md.Il faut donner un nom au widget (nom uni: You must give a name to the widget (unique name), the type of interface, if the widget is intended for the PC (Dashboard) or mobile, then the library to use (Jeedom, Personal image or packs)
index.md.Puis il vous faut choisir l'icône pour l: Then you must choose the icon for State 0 and 1, as well as the size of the icon (value in "EM" =% of the original size of the browser font, 1 = 100%)
index.md.Ceci fait, le code source apparaît en de: This done, the source code appears below the configuration area
index.md.Ne pas modifier ces informations si vous: Do not modify this information if you do not know what you are doing
index.md.Il ne reste plus qu'à valider pour final: It only remains to validate to finalize the creation of the widget
index.md.Vous serez automatiquement redirigé sur: You will be automatically redirected to the advanced configuration page which allows you to apply the widget to several commands
index.md.En mode avancé, il faut avoir des connai: In advanced mode, you must have knowledge of programming language "HTML", "CSS" and "JavaScript" to be able to modify a widget correctly
index.md.Il existe plusieurs sites en FR sur le w: There are several sites in FR on the web to learn these languages, I recommend OpenClassRoom which explains everything from the beginning
index.md.Pour accéder au mode avancé, il vous suf: To access the advanced mode, simply go to the widget plugin, choose the widget to modify or click on the "Add widget" button
index.md.Depuis la page principale du plugin, cli: From the main plugin page, click on "Add a Widget
index.md.Jeedom vous demande quelques infos sur l: Jeedom asks you some info on the future widget
index.md.Le nom doit être un nom unique: Name must be a unique name
index.md.Vérifiez donc que ce nom n'existe pas dé: So check that this name does not already exist
index.md.Version, correspond au type d'appareil p: Version, corresponds to the type of device for which it is intended (PC or Mobile)
index.md.Type, correspond au type de commande qui: Type, corresponds to the type of command that will use the widget
index.md.Sous-type, donne une précision au type c: Sub-type, gives precision to the type chosen previously
index.md.On peut modifier le nom, type et sous-ty: You can change the name, type and subtype later
index.md.Toutefois, cela peut avoir des incidence: However, this may have implications if the widget is already applied to one or more commands
index.md.Il vaut donc mieux l'éviter: It is therefore better to avoid it
index.md.Le type \"info\" est utilisé pour des co: The type "info" is used for commands which return a value, for example, a module state, a numerical value (temperature, brightness, humidity etc), a text or any other information
index.md.pour tous les autres types d'infos comme: for all other types of info like texts
index.md.Le type \"action\" est utilisé pour des: The "action" type is used for commands that will have an action in Jeedom or on external equipment
index.md.utilisé pour créer des curseurs permetta: used to create cursors for changing numeric values
index.md.Utilisé pour créer une zone de saisie de: Used to create a text entry area with send button
index.md.utilisé pour créer un bouton de choix de: used to create a color choice button
index.md.Jeedom vous redirige sur la page princip: Jeedom redirects you to the main page of Widget configuration / modification
index.md.A partir de là, le widget est créé dans: From there, the widget is created in Jeedom but does not currently contain any code for displaying the command
index.md.Une fois sur la page principale de confi: Once on the main config page of a widget, it is in the "source code" part that the changes in appearance apply
index.md.Pour modifier ces infos il faut avoir qu: To modify this info you need to have some basics in HTML, CSS and JavaScript programming
index.md.Les modifications peuvent avoir un impac: The modifications can have a significant impact on the display of the widget and the display of other widgets, or even block the display of all widgets
index.md.La base (squelette) d'un widget se fait: The base (skeleton) of a widget is in HTML
index.md.Cela permet de structurer l'affichage et: This allows you to structure the display and find information more simply
index.md.Dans Jeedom pour les widgets, le premier: In Jeedom for widgets, the first piece of code to create is a "div" that will act as the main container for all the code in our Widget
index.md.Dans cette \"div\", on peut y trouver ju: In this "div", you can find up to 3 distinct sub-parts
index.md.La partie HTML qui va afficher les infor: The HTML part which will display the information
index.md.La partie CSS qui va rendre plus joli en: The CSS part which will make it more attractive by formatting the HTML part (Optional Part)
index.md.La partie JavaScript qui permet de trava: The JavaScript part which allows you to work on various actions, calculations and animations
index.md.Plutôt que de longs discours, voici un e: Rather than long speeches, here is an example of basic code for a widget
index.md.La structure de base qui schématise les: The basic structure which schematizes the different locations in our widget is now created
index.md.Pour autant, on n'a rien qui s'affiche,: However, we have nothing displayed, it's normal
index.md.conteneur multifonction relativement pol: relatively versatile multipurpose container with line feed after it
relatively versatile multipurpose container with no line feed after it
index.md.Conteneur pour le code CSS qui sera appl: Container for the CSS code that will be applied in general (be careful its content can affect all the elements of the page)
index.md.En l'état, il est difficile de faire quo: As it is, it is difficult to do anything with this piece of code
index.md.C'est pourquoi on va ajouter quelques op: This is why we will add some options (called Attribute in HTML language) in our tags
index.md.L'attribut \"id\" est déconseillé sur Je: The "id" attribute is not recommended on Jeedom
index.md.Pour être sûr d'éviter un conflit au niv: To be sure to avoid a conflict at the level of IDs (which can crash the whole web page), under Jeedom we use class-ids and "data" attributes
index.md.Cela permet d'être sûr qu'en cas de coll: This makes it possible to be sure that in the event of a collision, the entire web page will not be crashed
index.md.Les class contrairement aux ids ne sont: Classes unlike ids are not unique
index.md.Elle servent à appliquer un style défini: They are used to apply a style defined in the style part (the tag)
index.md.On peut ainsi reproduire simplement une: We can thus simply reproduce the same formatting that we create once and that we reuse by keyword (class)
index.md.Ici on ajoute plusieurs class définies e: Here we add several basic defined and available classes in Jeedom (see Jeedom class below)
index.md.Jeedom utilise à la place de l'attribut: Jeedom uses instead of the id attribute, a class like id, this makes it possible to make an element unique on the page in order to find it and target it more easily
index.md.Il est impératif que sa valeur soit uniq: It is imperative that its value is unique on the page
index.md.Pour cela je vous conseille d'utiliser u: For this I advise you to use a word that represents our element
index.md.Dans notre exemple la div représente l'e: In our example the div represents the whole of our widget, so we can use the name of our widget or an abbreviation (here I chose Doc-)
index.md.Ensuite, afin de garantir que la class-i: Then, in order to guarantee that the class-id is unique, we will put a tag
index.md.(pour plus d'info sur les tags Jeedom vo: (for more info on Jeedom tags see below), which gives "Doc
index.md.cette attribut permet de stocker le type: this attribute allows to store the type of the command on which the widget will be applied
index.md.Il faut donc que sa valeur corresponde a: Its value must therefore correspond to the type parameter above the code area
index.md.cette attribut permet de stocker le sous: this attribute allows to store the subtype of the command on which the widget will be applied
index.md.Il faut donc que sa valeur corresponde a: Its value must therefore correspond to the subtype parameter above the code area
index.md.Cet attribut prend comme valeur le Tag \: This attribute takes as value the Tag \
index.md.Il est utilisé par Jeedom pour la mise à: It is used by Jeedom for updating the Dashboard
index.md.A partir de là, on a une base qui corres: From there, we have a base which corresponds to the Jeedom standard. It is
index.md.le code minimaliste qu'il faut pour avoi: the minimalist code it takes to have a widget that respects the
index.md.Ne pas oublier de modifier l'attribut da: Do not forget to modify the data-type and data-subtype attribute if you modify these values in the widget config
index.md.Cette partie qui vient s'ajouter entre l: This part which is added between the 2 "style" tags, allows to declare formatting rules
index.md.Cette partie est facultative car on peut: This part is optional because you can add the formatting directly in the style attribute of a tag or using JavaScript
index.md.L'utilisation de cette partie est donc u: The use of this part is therefore a matter of preference to properly separate HTML and CSS
index.md.Tout code déclaré dans des balises style: Any code declared in style tags, applies to the whole page
index.md.Il faut donc bien faire attention au sél: So be careful with the CSS selector that you choose to use so as not to alter the other widgets
index.md.Afin de ne pas impacter d'autres widgets: In order not to unintentionally impact other widgets by the CSS code that you are going to put there, I advise you to use the id selector which targets your widget
index.md.Exemple, si je veux mettre en rouge le t: Example, if I want to put in red the text located in the "Span" tag, we would tend to write
index.md.Code mis dans la balise Style: Code put in the Style tag
index.md.Mais cela aurait pour effet de changer l: But that would change the text color of all the span on the page
index.md.Donc pour éviter cela, ajouter un sélect: So to avoid this, add an id selector that targets your widget to limit its action
index.md.Code mis dans la balise Style et délimit: Code put in the Style tag and delimited
index.md.devant le sélecteur span, on délimite la: in front of the span selector, we delimit the modification inside our widget
index.md.Le JavaScript se met entre les balises \: JavaScript is put between the tags "Script
index.md.On utilise le JavaScript pour faire des: We use JavaScript to do calculations, convert data, animate the widget, format the widget, perform actions on the widget based on events
index.md.En plus du JavaScript de base, Jeedom in: In addition to basic JavaScript, Jeedom incorporates by default several Frameworks which simplify JavaScript code
index.md.On peut donc utiliser sans les initialis: So we can use without initializing them
index.md.En cas d'erreur dans le code JS, cela pe: In the event of an error in the JS code, this can block all the JS codes that may follow, whether in the widget or other widgets
index.md.Il faut donc être prudent lors des modif: So be careful when making changes
index.md.Si après avoir enregistré une modificati: If after having saved a modification of the widget, the toothed wheel contained to rotate indefinitely, you may have made a JS error which causes the continuation of the JS execution to crash on the page
index.md.Pour pouvoir corriger il vous suffit de: To be able to correct it, you just have to pass the div id = jqueryLoadingDiv in display none using the browser console, correct the code and save
index.md.Il faut aussi faire F5 pour actualiser l: You also have to do F5 to refresh the page
index.md.Dans Jeedom vous rencontrerez souvent le: In Jeedom you will often come across tags which are names surrounded by "\
index.md.Le principe de fonctionnement de ces tag: The principle of operation of these tags is simple
index.md.Jeedom vas les remplacer par la valeur q: Jeedom will replace them with the value that corresponds to the tag
index.md.Les Tags sont des sortes de variables (b: Tags are sorts of variables (boxes) in which values that are unknown at the time of writing the code are stored
index.md.C'est un peu comme si l'on faisait un te: It's a bit like making a text with blanks to put words in it later that would give variable meaning to the text
index.md.Tous les tags ne sont pas disponibles av: Not all tags are available with all types of orders, so here is the list and their details
index.md.ID de la commande créé par Jeedom à la c: Order ID created by Jeedom when the order was created (unique numeric value)
index.md.A utiliser comme du texte, en JS ou dans: Use as text, in JS or in HTML attributes
index.md.A utiliser comme du texte ou en JS: Use as text or in JS
index.md.A utiliser pour l'affichage du nom de la: To be used for displaying the name of the command at widget level
index.md.Vide si le nom de la commande doit être: Empty if the name of the command must be displayed
index.md.none;\" si le nom de la commande ne doit: none; "if the name of the command should not be displayed
index.md.Valeur maximale que peut prendre la comm: Maximum value that can take the order
index.md.Nom de la commande info liée, si la comm: Name of the linked info command, if the action command is linked to an info command, name of the action command otherwise
index.md.Dernière valeur de la commande (peut êtr: Last value of the order (can be empty)
index.md.Unité de la commande A utiliser comme du: Command unit To be used as text or in JS
index.md.Retourne la date et heure de la dernière: Returns the date and time of the last widget update in format
index.md.A utiliser comme du texte, en JS, ou dan: Use as text, in JS, or in the title attribute
index.md.Valeur de la commande A utiliser comme d: Command value To be used as text or in JS
index.md.Permet de prendre en compte l'option \"A: Allows you to take into account the option "Display statistics on widgets" in the "General" menu ⇒ "Administration" ⇒ "Configuration" tab "Configuration of commands
index.md.Si l'option est sur oui, le tag retourne: If the option is on yes, the tag will return a blank otherwise
index.md.A utiliser dans l'attribut \"style\" d'u: To be used in the "style" attribute of an html tag to display if logging is activated in the Jeedom config
index.md.Valeur moyenne sur les x dernières heure: Average value over the last x hours of the command To be used as text or in JS
index.md.Minimum sur les x dernières heures de la: Minimum over the last x hours of the order To be used as text or in JS
index.md.Maximum sur les x dernières heures de la: Maximum over the last x hours of the order To be used as text or in JS
index.md.Permet si l'historique de la valeur est: Allows if the value history is activated to return the class
index.md.(icone trait, flèche bas, flèche haut),: (line icon, down arrow, up arrow), linked to the trend of the value To be used in the attribute
index.md.history cursor' (Voir les class CSS Jeed: history cursor '(See Jeedom CSS class), otherwise it will be replaced by an empty
index.md.Le tag permet donc d'afficher ou non le: The tag therefore allows to display or not the history graph on the dashboard
index.md.A utiliser dans l'attribut \"class\" de: To be used in the "class" attribute of the main div
index.md.Doit impérativement être ajouté à l'attr: Must be added to the "class" attribute of the main div, this class allows the widget to be updated
index.md.Sans cette class le widget ne se met à j: Without this class the widget is only updated by refreshing the page
index.md.Cette class est recommandée car elle per: This class is recommended because it allows you to add some default CSS parameters to the widget for good behavior
index.md.Permet de modifier le pointeur en main: Allows you to change the pointer in hand
index.md.Cette class permet de modifier le pointe: This class allows you to modify the pointer in hand, and when clicking to display the history of the widget's value
index.md.C'est pour le title d'un élément au lieu: It is for the title of an element instead of being yellow it becomes translucent black with the white text
index.md.Comment apprendre à faire un widget: How to learn to make a widget
index.md.Le système de widget s'appuie sur les la: The widget system is based on the HTML and Javascript languages, so it is advisable to watch the courses (very numerous) on these languages
index.md.De plus il est intéressant de lire aussi: In addition it is interesting to also read courses on Jquery (and Jquery mobile for the mobile version of widgets)
index.md.Une autre façon est de faire un widget e: Another way is to make a widget in "easy creation", so the plugin will automatically generate the code of your widgets
